The Menu of the day is ordered until 15:00 pm

28 lei without dessert / 41 lei with dessert

Saturday 

Cream Mushroom Soup – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 330 ml (mushroom, leek, potato, white onion, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Green Lentil– vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 300 g (green lentils, celery, carrot, red onion, tomato, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Whole Wheat Bread – vegan / 70 g

or gluten free option

Seeds Crackers Bread – raw / gluten free / 40 g (sun flower seeds, pumpkin seeds, flaxseed, dehydrated tomatoes, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Chocolate Cake – raw / gluten free / 110 g (cashew, almonds, dates, fresh cocoa powder, alkaline cocoa, unfiltered honey)
